name: All Times Played
description:
I have a lot of games on my PC. To be honest, I love them all.

A lot of them is survival, sandbox or simulation.

And one time, I've been thinking: "What if I would create a game about all the games I have on my pc?"

And that's how "All Times Played" was born!

The game currently contains elements from such titles as:

-Scrap Mechanic

-The Long Drive

-Bum Simulator & Hobo: Tough Life

-The Sims 4

-Raft

-Muck

-Mr. Prepper

-Garry's Mod

-There Is No Game: Wrong Dimension

and Minecraft!

Note: I recommend you checking all of the games I put here by your own, these are very cool games, and also, some of the credits for the music or inspiration goes to the developers of these games!

Game by itself might be boring sometimes, but I still really hope you'll enjoy it!

Also, you can review my game in the comments!

How To Play:

W, A, S, D - Movement

Space - Jump

L - Agency list (It's actually important!)

Tab - Inventory & Crafting

Esc - Pause menu

Q - Drop item

E - Use item / interact

LMB (Left mouse button) - Interact / (If hammer is in hand) Hit / Attack

RMB (Right mouse button) - (If gravity gun is in hand) Hit with gravity / (if crafted a block) place block

More updates & trailer coming soon...
